function_call.name: get_risks
function_call.arguments: {"risks":[{"Description":"Possible transmission of COVID-19 through the completion of an online questionnaire.","Impact":"Risk of spreading the disease among participants and data collectors.","Mitigation":"Implement strict hygiene and safety protocols for online data collection.","Technologies":"Secure online platforms for data collection and dissemination.","People":"Participants, data collectors, researchers.","Owner":"Research team, data collectors."},{"Description":"Inaccurate data due to invalid questionnaire responses or unwillingness of participants to provide valid information.","Impact":"Compromised validity and reliability of research findings.","Mitigation":"Conduct thorough cleaning processes to remove ineligible cases and meaningless data.","Technologies":"Data cleaning algorithms and processes.","People":"Researchers, data analysts, research participants.","Owner":"Research team, data analysts."},{"Description":"Lack of privacy and data security for participants due to online questionnaire administration.","Impact":"Risk of data breaches and unauthorized access to sensitive information.","Mitigation":"Use secure and encrypted online platforms for data collection and storage.","Technologies":"Encryption software, secure data storage systems.","People":"Participants, research team.","Owner":"Research team, IT professionals."}]}
